skillTree.name: Norscan Warhorse
skillTree.description: The horses of Norsca live for battle, even choosing to graze on the bones of the fallen over grass.

skillTree.name: Marauder Chariot
skillTree.description: Marauder mobs are awarded even greater mobility when riding their crude chariots of bone and wood, lashed together with the guts and sinew of the vanquished.

skillTree.name: War Mammoth
skillTree.description: Tainted and savage they may be, but these behemoths remain willing to bear high-status Marauders into battle, trampling flat everything foolish enough to get in their way.

skillTree.name: Eye of the Gods
skillTree.description: The slightest glance, the merest glimpse from one of the Dark Gods is sufficient to propel their playthings to ever-greater feats of desolation.

skillTree.name: Voice of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.name: Drinker of Blood
skillTree.description: Dining upon the blood of slaughtered enemies may attract the notice, and maybe the favour, of the Hound.

skillTree.name: Chron's Wrath
skillTree.description: The Great Hound of War thirsts eternally for blood and slaughter, its rage manifesting itself in the unstoppable martial spirit of its warriors.

skillTree.name: Fury of the Hound
skillTree.description: The Hound's unearthly fury is personified by its Champions' thirst for war and hunger for unending blood and violence.

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

skillTree.name: Noxious Vessel
skillTree.description: Thusly, the virulent maladies of the Crow are borne forth to repulse and infect its mortal foes; there lieth victory eternal.

skillTree.name: Putrefying Ooze
skillTree.description: This fetid, disgusting pus is so repulsive to the untainted that it mimics traditional armour of far greater substance.

skillTree.name: Plague of the Crow
skillTree.description: Unstable and miscreated, the Crow's strength spreads and grows like the most successful of diseases, consuming all before consuming itself and beginning again.

skillTree.name: Indulger in the Exotic
skillTree.description: The Serpent's temptations come in many forms, all of them designed to appeal to the twisted desires buried deep within us all.

skillTree.name: Intoxicating Visions
skillTree.description: Seductive images of sensual luxuries may tempt the enemy from their chosen paths onto roads much, much less travelled and from which there can be no return.

skillTree.name: Seduction of the Serpent
skillTree.description: Although the youngest of the Dark Gods, the Serpent is no less potent and can bind mortals to eternal service with alluring visions or tantalising temptations.

skillTree.name: Spirit Wanderer
skillTree.description: More fool they who go to war and quest with minds unfocused, for they risk the Eagle's desolate, underhand deceptions.

skillTree.name: Dark Deceiver
skillTree.description: The Eagle weaves a complex web of duplicity around its servants, further bracing their combat abilities in subtle, unexpected ways.

skillTree.name: Sorcery of the Eagle
skillTree.description: As the undisputed master of magic, the Eagle uses complex sorcery to influence its followers and draw opponents into his multifarious, interwoven schemes.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Dominating Presence
skillTree.description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fearsome Warriors
skillTree.description: Those who do not bend the knee to the Gods of the North soon find all they hold dear obliterated before them.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Beast Slayers
skillTree.description: Delighting in death and suffering, these savage warriors follow their ignoble Lord wherever he goes.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Unnatural Selection
skillTree.description: Only the fiercest creatures can survive the frozen north; the strongest are rounded up for war and starved into viciousness, ready for the next battle.

effects.description:
Speed: +6% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +9% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Frostbitten
skillTree.description: The intense cold cuts into the flesh, burning the foe's extremities until they drop off altogether!

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hail of Teeth
skillTree.description: The razor-sharp hail of the north is not the only danger in the Norscan sky – its airborne beasts are just as deadly and far less predictable.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monsters of the North
skillTree.description: Giant, deadly, and able to take orders, this Lord’s monstrosities are especially terrifying and lethal.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Champions of the North
skillTree.description: In spite of their savage nature, they are possessed of a savage code of conduct and form a loose brotherhood of those considered worthy.

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hardened Hunters
skillTree.description: No beast too large, no adversary too great; no quarry - mortal or otherwise - can evade them.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +12% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Icy Wrath
skillTree.description: The intense cold and near-constant darkness of the far north make for a certain kind of killer.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hulks of Death
skillTree.description: The freezing darkness and stunning violence of the far north bring no small solace to those who have lost everything and wish to forget.

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 8% for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Stand or Die!
skillTree.description: There can be no turning back for those whose souls are turning black.

skillTree.name: Fight or Die!
skillTree.description: There is no other choice. There never was.

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Takers of All
skillTree.description: That which is not offered up to the Dark Gods of the North in tribute is harvested by their servants for their own petty gain.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Norse Resilience
skillTree.description: The bleak, brutal landscape of the far north breeds bloody, warlike tribes in thrall to Chaos' delicious, twisted power.

skillTree.name: Swelling of Doom
skillTree.description: Maybe it is the influence of the Dark Gods that has caused the populace to burgeon and proliferate beyond their natural bounds?

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Ruination
skillTree.description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

effects.description:
Attrition suffered by defender: +5% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +10% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +15% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Savage Skills
skillTree.description: There's something about the harsh, unforgiving nature of northern life that makes its occupants fight harder and longer than many of their soft, southern equivalents.

skillTree.name: Unnatural Healing
skillTree.description: Something strange - something no scholar really wishes to discover - governs who dies and who lives in the warlike northern wastes.

skillTree.name: Fuelled by War
skillTree.description: War and glory before the Gods are the determining elements in every decision made; there is nothing else worth living - or dying - for.

skillTree.name: Spawn of Chaos
skillTree.description: The tendrils (and tentacles!) of the Northern Gods reach down from the poles and far across the world, twisting and corrupting all they touch.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +150
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Diabolic Splendour
backgroundSkills.description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Misshapen
backgroundSkills.description: Deformed from birth or made so by the Ruinous Powers, yet there is honour within the prison of flesh.

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.
